Zed.name: ZedБ
Zed.title: Ббthe Master of ShadowsбБ
Zed.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪZed is the first ninja in 200 years to unlock the ancient, forbidden ways. He defied his clan and master, casting off the balance and discipline that had shackled him all his life. Zed now offers power to those who embrace knowledge of the shadows, and slays those who cling to ignorance.ЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйAn orphan, Zed was taken in and trained by a great ninja master. Only one other student appeared to be Zed's equal - the master's son, Shen. It seemed Zed could never win the favor of the master, as every match between the rivals ended in a draw. Frustrated and jealous, he sought an advantage. The young ninja ventured into a sealed part of the clan's temple, where he found an ornate, foreboding box. Sensing the dark knowledge within, Zed knew he should not open it, but he peered inside nonetheless. In an instant, shadows touched his mind, revealing techniques that had long been hidden. Now armed with a secret edge, he challenged Shen, and this time he defeated the master's son. He expected praise and recognition in his moment of victory, but somehow the master knew Zed had used forbidden ways, and banished him.йЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИHumiliated, the young ninja wandered for years. His bitterness turned to ambition, and he began to train others in the style of the shadows. As his power grew, so did his circle of followers, but he knew that without the box, his technique would never be perfect. One day, Zed looked at his followers and saw that his students were now an army. He led them back to the temple to claim his prize. At the gates, he was surprised to find the old master waiting, receiving Zed and his disciples as if they were welcome guests. The old man laid his sword at Zed's feet, declaring that he had failed Zed as his master. By banishing his former student, the master had doomed Zed to the shadows, instead of leading him to the balanced path. The old man implored Zed to enter the temple, destroy the box, and lead his followers to balance. The dark ninja followed the master inside. Moments later, the assembled ninjas heard Zed cry out in pain. Mysteriously, he emerged unscathed, and threw the severed head of the master at Shen's feet. Screaming in rage, Zed commanded his followers to slaughter the master's students and seize the box.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюThat day, the old ninja order fell. Though many students died, some escaped thanks to Shen's heroic efforts. Now the temple is a dark training ground for the Order of the Shadow. Zed rules as the Order's master, and his edict is simple: perfect one's technique, and kill all ninjas who refuse to embrace the shadows.ЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГг''Balance is a lie - we are the true ninjas.''ДгГбБ

-- ZedБ

allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзSaving energy and spell cooldowns until you use your ultimate will maximize Death Mark's damage.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзQuickly double tapping Living Shadow will teleport Zed to his shadow immediately for rapid escapes.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжPlacing a Living Shadow before using Death Mark can give Zed a safe escape from combat.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзZed recieves bonus effect from attack damage items he purchases, so armor is super effective against him.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиAfter Zed uses his Living Shadow, he is at his most vulnerable as his damage, slow, and mobility are both dependent upon it.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖZed's Shadow Slash can only slow you if his shadow hits you with it. ЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбRazor ShurikenБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИZed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдZed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing ДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДд physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and дДгГбБ{{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }})БбГг physical damage to each additional enemy.гГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзAdditional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 50% less damage than the previous shuriken.ЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбLiving ShadowБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФZed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts.  Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow. Zed's Attack Damage is passively increased.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БPassive: БGrants Б{{ e2 }}БбГг% additional bonus Attack Damage ГбБ(+{{ f3 }}).

БбГгДдZed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds. ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжReactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.жЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗZed's shadows mimic his abilities. If an ability strikes any target twice, Zed restores ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГгДд energy. Energy can only be restored once per mimicked ability.ЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БShadow SlashБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзZed and his shadow spins their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгZed and his shadow slash, dealing ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг physical damage to nearby enemies. ГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗEach enemy champion hit by Zed's Shadow Slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдEach enemy hit by a mimicked Shadow Slash will be slowed by дДгГбБ{{ e2 }}Бб% for 1.5 seconds.бБ

БбГгДдEnemies hit by both Shadow Slashes will be slowed by ДгГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГг% but will not take additional damage.гГбБ

spells.name: БDeath MarkБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцZed dashes to target Champion, projecting a shadow behind them, and marking the champion for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active. ЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщZed becomes untargetable and dashes to target enemy champion. Upon arrival, he marks the target for death and spawns a Living Shadow behind the target. This shadow lasts 4 seconds and mimics Zed's abilities. Reactivating Death Mark will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.ЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжAfter 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing physical damage equal to ЖдДгГбБ{{ a1 }} plus Б{{ e2 }}БбГгДдЖжЗз% of all magic and physical damage dealt to the target by Zed and his shadows while the mark was active.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БбContempt for the WeakбБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпZed's basic attacks against targets below 50% health deal 8% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
